name: AWSCodePipelinePipelineDisableInboundStageTransitions
description: DisableInboundStageTransitions is a property of the AWS::CodePipeline::Pipeline resource that specifies which AWS CodePipeline stage to disable transitions to.

properties.name: Reason
properties.description: An explanation of why the transition between two stages of a pipeline was disabled.

properties.name: StageName
properties.description: The name of the stage to which transitions are disabled.
